modName: Eragon Total Conversion --- RECRUITING NEW TEAM MEMBERS
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION:  SEEKING MODELERS AND TEXTURERS of any skill level!  Please PM me if interested!

Website ------>    http://www.acgteam.tk

Nexus Page ---->  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23953

We only go by the books!

I am ElSte17 (you might know my Flyable Dragon Races or Aquatic Life Overhaul mods) and I am here to represent the Alagaesia Creation Group, which is a mod team that is currently working on a Total Conversion mod to recreate the world of the Inheritance Series (Eragon, Eldest, etc) using Skyrim.  If you have heard of MERP (r.i.p. for now) we doing something very similar, except that we have been given permission by the author himself, Christopher Paolini!

I am not currently releasing any form of mod in this post (we are still working on preparing the first release) though as you can tell by the headline, we are currently in high demand of more modelers and texturers (and other team members such as for scripting, quest writing, map design, etc).  I figured the best way to find modders was by posting on here!

Your experience is not necessarily important, so long as you can prove decent skill.  You should be able to produce something along the lines of these things I have made for the group so far (perhaps better or worse).

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8209/8167009889_e429867402_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8045/8128767298_fc7c8c6547_c.jpg[/img]

PLEASE CONTACT ME THROUGH PM if you are interested!
author: ElSte17

files.name: DOWNLOAD AND ENDORSE TO BRING AWARENESS PLEASE
